data.kc360-10: Collaboration: Create KC 360 Collaborative, sub-groups, and advisory council
data.title: Create KC 360 Collaborative
data.description: Create KC 360 Collaborative (6/22), Sub-Groups (4/24) and Advisory Council (5/24). Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of efforts to bring leaders and residents together consistently to develop and implement strategies to prevent and reduce gun violence.

data.kc360-10: Collaboration: Include all voices: lived experience, youth, families, leaders, stakeholders
data.title: Include all voices
data.description: Include all Voices: Lived Experience, Youth, Families, Leaders & Stakeholders. (7/23). Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of efforts to bring leaders and residents together consistently to develop and implement strategies to prevent and reduce gun violence.

data.kc360-10: Collaboration: Common goals, vision, database/inventory of resources
data.title: Common goals
data.description: Common Goals (11/22), Vision (1/23) & Database/Inventory of Resources (6/24). Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of efforts to bring leaders and residents together consistently to develop and implement strategies to prevent and reduce gun violence.

data.kc360-10: Collaboration: 10 things individuals and organizations can do
data.title: Identify 10 things individuals and organizations can do
data.description: Identify 10 Things Individuals Can Do and 10 Things Organizations Can Do (KC Blueprint). Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of efforts to bring leaders and residents together consistently to develop and implement strategies to prevent and reduce gun violence.

data.title: Collaboration: Bring leaders and residents together consistently
data.description: CREATE ONE UNITED PLAN (4/2024). Lead: KCCG/KC360, City of KC, KC Health Department, KCPD.

data.kc360-10: Collaboration: Bold data sharing, communication, and maps
data.title: Create channels for bold/open communication
data.description: Create channels for bold/open communication/sharing of data, trends, and maps. (6/22). Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of building stronger and more effective police community relationships.

data.kc360-10: Collaboration: Consistent engagement of stakeholders
data.title: Engage consistently
data.description: Engage consistently with youth, families, neighborhoods, stakeholders, and leaders. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of building stronger and more effective police community relationships.

data.kc360-10: Collaboration: Build and implement systems of transparency, accountability, and reform
data.title: Build and implement systems of transparency
data.description: Build and implement systems of transparency, accountability, and reform. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of building stronger and more effective police community relationships.

data.kc360-10: Collaboration: De-escalation training
data.title: Implement training on de-escalation
data.description: Implement training on de-escalation (everyone goes home safe), bias and mental health. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of building stronger and more effective police community relationships.

data.title: Collaboration: Build stronger and more effective police community relationships
data.description: Lead: KCPD, KCCG/KC 360 Police-Community Sub-group.

data.kc360-10: Prevention: Provide positive activities and entertainment outside school
data.title: Provide positive activities and entertainment
data.description: Provide positive activities and entertainment/after school, evenings and weekends. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of addressing root causes and implementing quality programs.

data.kc360-10: Prevention: Expand school-based programs for youth/families
data.title: Provide quality programs for youth/families
data.description: Provide quality programs for youth/families. Expand school-based programs. (7/24). Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of addressing root causes and implementing quality programs.

data.kc360-10: Prevention: Invest in root cause basic needs, education, economics
data.title: Address root causes through investments
data.description: Address root causes through investments in basic needs, education, income, higher wage employment, home ownership, entrepreneurship, health, and wealth-building. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of addressing root causes and implementing quality programs.

obstacle.label: Prevention - Address root causes and implement quality programs, positive activities

data.title: Prevention: Address root causes and implement quality programs/positive activities
data.description: Lead: Youth KC 360 Sub-group. Root Cause - EN, City, Urban League, Civic Council.

data.kc360-10: Prevention: Address beautification, vacant lots, abandoned and dilapidated homes
data.title: Use assets and build capacity
data.description: Use assets and build capacity of neighborhoods and partners to address beautification, vacant lots, abandoned and dilapidated homes. (Santa Fe(23)/Neighborhoods – Ongoing). Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of transforming the built environment in disinvested neighborhoods.

data.kc360-10: Prevention: Invest in home renovations and developments
data.title: Invest in home renovations and developments
data.description: Invest in home renovations, affordable housing, and mixed income developments. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of transforming the built environment in disinvested neighborhoods.

data.kc360-10: Prevention: Improve streets, parks, trees, and sidewalks
data.title: Improve streets, parks, trees, and sidewalks
data.description: Improve streets, parks, trees, and sidewalks. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of transforming the built environment in disinvested neighborhoods.

data.title: Prevention: Transform the built environment by investing in disinvested neighborhoods
data.description: Lead: EN and KCCG Village Strategy, Neighborhood Associations, City of KC.

data.kc360-10: Intervention: Invest in street intervention and outreach
data.title: Invest in street intervention and outreach
data.description: Invest in street intervention and outreach organizations and workers. (22/23 & 5/24). Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of identifying and engaging individuals/groups most engaged in gun violence.

data.kc360-10: Intervention: Public health approach, provide alternatives through intervention teams
data.title: Provide alternatives through intervention teams
data.description: Provide alternatives through intervention teams (violence as public health approach): income, education, housing, employment with living wage+ opportunities. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of identifying and engaging individuals/groups most engaged in gun violence.

data.kc360-10: Intervention: Support families impacted by violence and conduct mediation and intervention
data.title: Support families impacted by violence
data.description: Support families impacted by violence and conduct mediation and intervention: street, schools, events, hospitals, prayerwalks and generationally involved families. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of identifying and engaging individuals/groups most engaged in gun violence.

data.kc360-10: Intervention: Engage Risk Terrain Model locations
data.title: Engage specific locations support
data.description: Engage specific locations support w/Risk Terrain Model & Multi-disciplinary teams (23). Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of identifying and engaging individuals/groups most engaged in gun violence.

data.kc360-10: Intervention: Support families in Crisis/Homicides
data.title: Support families in Crisis/Homicides
data.description: Support families in Crisis/Homicides. Interrupters. Chaplains. Funerals. Follow-up. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of identifying and engaging individuals/groups most engaged in gun violence.

obstacle.label: Intervention - Identify individuals, groups most engaged in gun violence and engage

data.title: Intervention: Identify individuals/groups most engaged in gun violence and engage
data.description: Lead: KC 360 Intervention Sub-Group, P4P, Aim 4 Peace, Save KC, UL, FEC, Great Jobs KC.

data.title: Training on empathy, mediation, and de-escalation
data.description: Training on empathy, mediation, and de-escalation. (6/24). Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of implementing city-wide strategies and training focused on Conflict Resolution.

data.title: Training on preventing and addressing social media conflicts
data.description: Training on preventing and addressing social media conflicts. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of implementing city-wide strategies and training focused on Conflict Resolution.

data.title: Implement cognitive behavioral therapy
data.description: Implement cognitive behavioral therapy with high risk and whole family counseling. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of implementing city-wide strategies and training focused on Conflict Resolution.

data.title: Provide quality wrap-around services
data.description: Provide quality wrap-around services. Address trauma of intergenerational poverty. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of implementing city-wide strategies and training focused on Conflict Resolution.

data.kc360-10: Enforcement and Community Support: Options and alternatives to violence lifestyle
data.title: Provide options and alternatives to leave the violence lifestyle
data.description: Provide options and alternatives to leave the violence lifestyle. (6/24). Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of implementing strategies focused on highest level offenders for immediate impact.

data.kc360-10: Enforcement and Community Support: Tools & Strategies
data.title: Hold others accountable through targeted efforts
data.description: Hold others accountable through targeted efforts engaging law enforcement partners and community. Tools & Strategies. Shoot Review. ShotSpotter. CrimeStoppers. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of implementing strategies focused on highest level offenders for immediate impact.

data.kc360-10: Enforcement and Community Support: Remove illegal guns
data.title: Remove illegal guns
data.description: Remove illegal guns. Address suppliers and straw purchases. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of implementing strategies focused on highest level offenders for immediate impact.

data.kc360-10: Enforcement and Community Support: Gun violence hot spot focus
data.title: Focus attention on areas with the high level of gun violence
data.description: Focus attention on areas with the high level of gun violence. (Hot Spots, Risk Terrain Modeling, Multi-disciplinary Teams). Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of implementing strategies focused on highest level offenders for immediate impact.

data.title: Enforcement with Community Support: Implement strategies focused on highest level offenders (Focused deterrence)
data.description: Top priority for immediate impact. Lead: Save KC (focused deterrence board), KCPD, PSP and Law Enforcement Agencies.

data.kc360-10: Reentry and Recovery: Education, training, healing and trauma-informed care
data.title: Begin preparation upon entry
data.description: Begin preparation upon entry to include education, training, healing and trauma-informed care. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of preparing returning citizens for successful reentry.

data.kc360-10: Reentry and Recovery: Pre-release basic needs planning
data.title: Prepare for pre-release with a plan
data.description: Prepare for pre-release with a plan to address basic needs, education, employment, housing, reunification, substance abuse, restorative justice and other needs. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of preparing returning citizens for successful reentry.

data.title: Reentry and Recovery: Identify and prepare returning citizens for successful reentry
data.description: Lead: KC 360 Reentry Sub-Group, Second Chance.

data.description: Provide mental and physical health, health insurance, trauma-informed care. Goal is reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. Part of assuring that communities most impacted have access to quality health care services.

goal.data: Reducing gun violence through direct intervention and addressing root causes. (A Comprehensive and Balanced Approach: Based on National Best Practices & Local Innovation using the Omaha 360 Framework.)
